title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Crown Clash.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Crown Clash.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: As the sun dips below the horizon, a blazing comet races across the sky, leaving a trail of shimmering sparks in its wake. It spirals downward, illuminating the night with its fiery embrace. The air crackles with energy as it impacts the ground, sending shockwaves through the earth, creating a dazzling explosion of light and heat. Creatures watch in awe, while brave adventurers ready their weapons, sensing the cometâ€™s immense power. Will you harness its energy to unlock new abilities or face the chaos it brings? The choice is yours, but heed this warning: great power comes with great peril.
